title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server for running large language models locally (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a simple pull-run workflow.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client with sync & async APIs; PyPI package provides drop-in replacement for OpenAI calls.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you use any Ollama model as an LLM or embedding provider in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama; runs entirely in browser, no backend code needed.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library exposing Ollama endpoints with fluent builders and reactive wrappers.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with coloured output, history, and shell completions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding assistant with slash commands.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB; ingest PDFs and query via CLI.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes for Haystack 2.0 pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and async streaming.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama models as REST endpoints with admin UI and rate-limiting.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight Rust crate wrapping the Ollama HTTP API with Tokio and Serde for async workflows.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets users chat with any local Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds an /ollama command to query local models with thread support and file context.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that connects to Ollama and demonstrates multi-model selection.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an “Ask Ollama” command to summarize or rewrite notes using local models.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for the Ollama JavaScript client; zero native deps, works in browser and server.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for the Ollama Python client; drop-in compat with OpenAI chat & embed methods.
